name: Fruit Cobbler
author: St. Augustine School Cafeteria

ingredients.name: No. 2 can cherries, peaches or berries

instructions: Cream together butter and sugar. Stir in sifted dry ingredients alternately with milk. Beat until smooth. Pour in 8 x 8 inch pan. Spoon fruit over batter. Sprinkle with sugar. Pour fruit juice over top. Bake 45 to 50 minutes at 375Â°. In baking the batter will come to the top.
